entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning except minus 12 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning except minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3 except minus 7 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3 except minus 7 inland. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
